import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a voicemail"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/domains/{domain_uuid}/voicemails"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new voicemail box in the specified domain.

Notes:
- Some fields may be defaulted server-side (e.g., voicemail_password when omitted).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"domain_uuid","description":"The domain UUID.","example":"4018f7a3-8e0a-47bb-9f4f-04b1313e0e1b","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"voicemail_id":{"type":"number","description":"Numeric voicemail box number.","example":1001},"voicemail_password":{"type":"number","description":"Voicemail PIN/password. If omitted, the server may default it (e.g., to the voicemail_id) or generate a random PIN when password complexity is enabled.","example":1001},"voicemail_mail_to":{"type":"string","description":"Email address for voicemail-to-email notifications. Must be a valid email address. Must not be greater than 255 characters.","example":"frontdesk@example.com"},"voicemail_sms_to":{"type":"string","description":"Optional SMS destination for voicemail alerts.","example":"+12135551212"},"voicemail_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the voicemail box is enabled. Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"voicemail_file":{"type":"string","description":"Voicemail delivery mode (e.g., attach). Defaults to \"attach\" if omitted.","example":"attach"},"voicemail_local_after_email":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to keep voicemail local after emailing it. Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"voicemail_transcription_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail transcription is enabled. Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"voicemail_tutorial":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail tutorial is enabled. Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"voicemail_recording_instructions":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail recording instructions are enabled. Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"voicemail_description":{"type":"string","description":"Optional voicemail description/label.","example":"Front Desk Voicemail"},"greeting_id":{"type":"number","description":"Optional greeting ID to use for this mailbox.","example":3},"voicemail_alternate_greet_id":{"type":"number","description":"Optional alternate greeting ID. It will be used with default voicemail greeting.","example":200}},"required":["voicemail_id"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

(domain access)","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","example":{"error":{"type":"invalid_request_error","message":"You do not have access to this domain.","code":"forbidden_domain","param":"domain_uuid"}},"properties":{"error":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"invalid_request_error"},"message":{"type":"string","example":"You do not have access to this domain."},"code":{"type":"string","example":"forbidden_domain"},"param":{"type":"string","example":"domain_uuid"}}}}}}}},"404":{"description":"Domain not
